metadata.title: Build your business with AI

home.subTitle: AI Agents for Social Media Marketing
home.title: Grow your business with AI.
home.description: GrowGpt gives you AI agents that semi autonomously runs your marketing campaigns on social media.

benefits1.title: Effortless social Media Marketing
benefits1.description: AI-powered agents create, schedule, and optimize posts across platforms, saving you time and effort while ensuring consistent engagement.

benefits2.title: Smarter Targeting & Higher Conversions
benefits2.description: Leverage AI-driven insights to reach the right audience with the right message, boosting customer engagement and maximizing ROI.

cta.title: Start Growing Your Business Today

ready.title: Ready to get started?
ready.description: Our prebuilt templates give you everything you need to launch your marketing instantly. Skip the hassle of starting from scratch and focus on what makes your business stand out.

meetYourTeam.title: Meet Your AI Marketing Team
meetYourTeam.description: Our AI agents are designed to work together seamlessly, ensuring your marketing strategy is always on point and your campaigns are always optimized.
